pullRequest.title: Ask user for tab to start
pullRequest.bodyText:
User is asked what tab he wants to start in instead of taking last tab as starting point.
Fixes #1723

nodes.bodyText:
Typo.
should be "Select the tab to start at"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -523,7 +523,7 @@ settings.giveFeedback=Open
 settings.windowTitle=Settings
 settings.general=General
 settings.language=Language
-settings.general.rememberLastTab=Remember my last opened tab
+settings.general.startTab=Select the tab to starts at

@@ -759,3 +759,9 @@ replay.ignoreMapNotFound=Ignore and start replay
 replay.abortAfterMapNotFound=Abort and show more info
 replay.mapDownloadFailed=Map download failed for this replay
 replay.mapDownloadFailed.wannaContinue=We could not find the map mentioned in the replay file. However the game might still know where to find it. Consider this as a warning, that this replay might be broken.
+startTab.selectTab=Select the tab you want to starts at:

nodes.bodyText:
I'd suggest using @Value and @AllArgsConstructor.
Then remove @EqualsAndHashCode, remove @Getter private final and remove the constructor
This class also looks like a candidate for @Value (see above)
This class also looks like a candidate for @value (see above)
